actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-724.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 5741, a bill to amend section 103 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the interest on mortgage subsidy bonds will not be exempt from Federal income tax, and to exempt interest on certain savings from Federal income tax.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5741 (Mortgage subsidy bonds tax treatment).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 5741, a bill to amend section 103 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the interest on mortgage subsidy bonds will not be exempt from Federal income tax, and to exempt interest on certain savings from Federal income tax.
